name: Hero Teacher (English)
description:
STORY

You have been on vacation for a long time and when the vacation is over, you come to the village where your school is located. You can't see any of your students when you come, except Mustafa.

At that moment you realize that all your students have been kidnapped by ignorant people who don't like English. Now they all rely on you. You must save them!

CONTROLS

W = Up | A = Left | S = Down | D = Right

PRODUCERS

1 - Mustafa Behlül Çakı | Discord: KBY#1022(Coding/Level Design/Scenarist)   

2 - Yaşar Efe Yücel | Discord: prot0n#2136 (Designer/2D Artist)

________________________________________________________________________________

This game was made in 72 hours!

(It's a game I made for my teacher, but those who are not my teacher can also play :D)

Youtube: Kod Bilmeyen Yazılımcı
